Name: maximize_story_points_completed
Description: Maximize total story points of user stories scheduled into sprint backlogs

Name: minimize_total_task_effort
Description: Minimize total implementation effort over all tasks

Name: minimize_open_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize cumulative severity of blockers affecting tasks

Name: maximize_average_velocity
Description: Prefer assigning high-velocity teams to active work

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Maximize team satisfaction reported in retrospectives

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_benefit
Description: Maximize declared benefit of selected sprint goals

Name: maximize_review_attendance
Description: Maximize stakeholder participation in sprint reviews

Name: minimize_sprint_backlog_tasks
Description: Minimize number of tasks per sprint backlog to reduce WIP

Name: maximize_feature_priority_delivered
Description: Maximize sum of priorities of features selected from product backlogs

Name: maximize_documentation_linkage
Description: Maximize number of linked requirements in feature documentation
